The majority of the publications included patients who underwent DBS surgery with implantation in STN. However, a few reported patients with severe troublesome dyskinesia had GPi implantation.
13– 20 Only one mutation-positive patient ( GBA) was treated with VIM stimulation.
20 A number of different outcome measures are used to assess DBS treatment response and safety; the most commonly used being the Unified Parkinson’s Disease Rating Scale (UPDRS) and levodopa equivalent daily dose (LEDD) reduction.
